misc: Regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour as well with decent results
biography: Sami, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his calm demeanor and strategic play on the course. Representing Hirsala Golf, Sami has participated in six previous Hector Trophée tournaments and is expected to make his seventh appearance in 2025. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Sami's dedication to the sport remains unwavering.

Outside of the Hector Trophée, Sami regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour, consistently achieving respectable results. His experience in various competitive settings makes him a formidable player to watch, as his calculated approach and consistent performance demonstrate a deep understanding of the game. It remains to be seen if 2025 will be the year that Sami finally clinches the title.
